questions: Does serving on petit jury, grand jury, or state grand jury effect my unemployment eligibility?ï¿½
Do I Remain Eligible For Unemployment Benefits During My Service As a Petit Juror,Grand Juror, or State Grand Juror?
I am unemployed but have an interview scheduled for same day as jury duty what can I do?
I received a jury summons while on unemployment what should I do?
answers: Yes, you remain eligible for unemployment benefits. They are not affected by service as a juror. Please note, verification may be required.
